item.title: Getting started with gertty
item.description: When you’re ready to commit code in an OpenStack project, your patch will eventually land in a Gerrit queue for review. The web interface works well for most users, but it can be challenging to use when you have a large amount of projects to monitor. I recently became a core developer on the OpenStack-Ansible project and I searched for a better solution to handle lots of active reviews. This is where gertty can help.
